name: In re PHILADELPHIA ENTERTAINMENT AND DEVELOPMENT PARTNERS, L.P. Petition of Eastern Pennsylvania Citizens Against Gambling and James D. Schneller

parties: In re PHILADELPHIA ENTERTAINMENT AND DEVELOPMENT PARTNERS, L.P. Petition of Eastern Pennsylvania Citizens Against Gambling and James D. Schneller.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 3rd day of February, 2010, the Petition for Review is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.
